moreBlocks.lawyersAtWhitleyLawFirmSelectedForASuper: • Whitley, Robert E. On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
Having secured millions of dollars on behalf of victims of negligence, our attorneys at Whitley Law Firm in Kinston are uniquely qualified to advocate for people throughout North Carolina. We have nine locations serving people across the state in cases that range from car accidents to defective medical devices to wrongful death. Our team recognizes the serious impact these incidents have on people physically, financially and emotionally. That is why we devote all our resources into aggressively pursuing justice on their behalf.

Among the successes our law firm has had are the following:

• Obtaining a $4 million settlement for an iron worker injured on the job
• Securing a $1.5 million settlement following a car accident
• Recovering $5.5 million for a mail carrier struck by a vehicle.

These numbers are a reflection of what matters most to us: that the people who approach our law firm for guidance receive the best possible representation. In the decades we have spent navigating personal injury claims, we have helped thousands of people get back on their feet. This is due to our aggressive and proactive approach.

Additionally, our team knows exactly how to navigate the cases we handle. We have an attorney who is a board certified specialist in workers' compensation. Further, we are proficient in negotiation tactics to achieve favorable settlements, and we stand ready to go to trial if that agreement cannot be reached. Whitley Law Firm offers free initial consultations.
